name: Brand! New! Friends!
description:
Four washed-up performers become unlikely friends and attempt to take on the idol industry in this silly little Vocaloid fanfiction game.

This is mainly a visual novel with very light rpg elements! Four acts! A lot of dialogue! A town to explore and stat bars to fill up! One (1) catgirl! Features original music by:
* potatoTeto| Ankari| Snakaye| Aku P | Circus| ohsnarf *

Stars four cancelled Vocaloid characters: Zhanyin Lorra, Anri Rune, Ring Suzune, and Lui Hibiki, as well as a whole load of other regular vocas.

Comes with a pdf of the doodles that led to the creation of this game if you want some context / more content :^)

Additional writing by:
* Ola | Rice *

Guitar by:
* Jack Hughes | Adrian Punzalan * 

*But no knowledge of vocaloid is really needed**.
**Though it'll help give some context for some of the weirder worldbuilding choices but you'll probably still have a good time.
